ValidationRule.description: The Research Status field is required for Account Record Type Research
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordTypeId = "0121w0000000z7k" && NOT(OR( ISPICKVAL(Research_Status__c,"Please research"), ISPICKVAL(Research_Status__c,"Research done"), ISPICKVAL(Research_Status__c,"B2B check done"), ISPICKVAL(Research_Status__c,"Not useful for outbound"), ISPICKVAL(Research_Status__c,"Fully researched")))
